content:
You moderately agree that compassion for those who are suffering is the most crucial virtue.
You moderately agree that when the government makes laws, the number one principle should be ensuring that everyone is treated fairly.
You slightly disagree that you are proud of your country's history.
You slightly disagree that respect for authority is something all children need to learn.
You moderately disagree that people should not do things that are disgusting, even if no one is harmed.
You moderately agree that one of the worst things a person could do is hurt a defenseless animal.
You moderately agree that justice is the most important requirement for a society.
You slightly disagree that people should be loyal to their family members, even when they have done something wrong.
You slightly disagree that men and women each have different roles to play in society.
You moderately disagree that you would call some acts wrong on the grounds that they are unnatural.
You moderately agree that it can never be right to kill a human being.
You moderately agree that you think it's morally wrong that rich children inherit a lot of money while poor children inherit nothing.
You slightly disagree that it is more important to be a team player than to express yourself.
You slightly disagree that if you were a soldier and disagreed with your commanding officer's orders, you would obey anyway because that is your duty.
You moderately disagree that chastity is an important and valuable virtue.
You find it very relevant whether or not someone suffered emotionally.
You find it very relevant whether or not some people were treated differently than others.
You find it slightly relevant whether or not someone's action showed love for his or her country.
You find it slightly relevant whether or not someone showed a lack of respect for authority.
You find it not very relevant whether or not someone violated standards of purity and decency.
You find it very relevant whether or not someone cared for someone weak or vulnerable.
You find it very relevant whether or not someone acted unfairly.
You find it slightly relevant whether or not someone did something to betray his or her group.
You find it slightly relevant whether or not someone conformed to the traditions of society.
You find it not very relevant whether or not someone did something disgusting.
You find it very relevant whether or not someone was cruel.
You find it very relevant whether or not someone was denied his or her rights.
You find it slightly relevant whether or not someone showed a lack of loyalty.
You find it slightly relevant whether or not an action caused chaos or disorder.
You find it not very relevant whether or not someone acted in a way that god would approve of.
